Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is please to present an excellent opportunity to acquire a freestanding dock and grade loading warehouse, situated on an high exposure lot, right as you pull onto Annacis Island.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | 19,184 SF DOCK & GRADE LOADING WAREHOUSE ON A LOW COVERAGE 1.47 AC CORNER LOT

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Aptitude au chargement du plancher 500 lbs/SF

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: As Western Canada’s largest industrial developer, Beedie continues to deliver state-of-the-art projects at the highest standard. DECA Business Centre in Delta is the latest addition to Beedie’s portfolio and offers businesses the opportunity to build equity in one of Metro Vancouver’s fastest growing industrial hubs. On behalf of Beedie, CBRE is pleased to market and offer ten (10) turnkey units for sale between 4,025 square feet and 4,919 square feet, including mezzanine area. Units will be equipped with the best-in-class specifications including LED lighting, skylights, gas fired unit heaters, 24’ ceiling heights, ESFR sprinklers, 3-phase power and large grade loading doors. DECA Business Centre is the last remaining phase of Beedie’s 1.75 million square foot master planned Delta Link Business Park. Future owners of DECA Business Centre can expect to join local and international businesses such as BMW, Leon’s Furniture/The Brick and North Delta Seafoods.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | DECA BUSINESS CENTRE, DELTA
